Text: Sde Dov Airport:  Dov Field, Arabic: مطار سدي دوف‎ ‎ ), also known as Dov Hoz Airport (Hebrew: נמל התעופה דב הוז‎ ‎ , "Nemal HaTe'ufa Dov Hoz", Arabic: مطار دوف هوز‎ ‎ ) (IATA: SDV, ICAO: LLSD) is an airport located in Tel Aviv, Israel which mainly handles scheduled domestic flights to Eilat and Uvda (a.k.a. Ovda), northern Israel (Haifa and the Galilee), and the Golan Heights.
